name: Happy Hour Hero
description:
Happy Hour Hero is a cartoony, flow-state bartending game that boasts:
  • Four core modes - Happy Hour, Easy Casual, Normal Casual, and Hardcore!
  • Two minigames - Dart Attack and Bowling!
  • Seven drinks to master and a full bar to keep stocked!
  • Four leaderboards to climb!
  • Options for all playstyles - seated, standing, and roomscale. Smooth motion, snap turning, and teleportation!


We’ve not had a lot of luck hiring competent bar staff, but I have a feeling you’re the right one for the job. Keep the beer stocked, the spirits flowing, and the customers merry. Oh, and if you mess up, it’s coming out of your paycheck. It gets pretty busy, so just stay on your toes and don’t get mixed up. Alright? Welcome to the team.


Test your spirits!

If your shift goes well, you might just earn a spot on the global leaderboards. Fancy yourself a pro-mixer? Join the highballers in hardcore mode.

On-the-job training!

Not feeling competitive? Play in casual mode and serve customers who couldn’t care less!

Customers getting you down?

Take part in teambuilding activities and compete with your colleagues - score high in darts or smash bottles in the bowling alley - drinks on the loser!

Get your hands dirty!

We built this bar from the ground up for VR, so you'd better make it a success!
